name: Children's Color Block Nylon Backpack PRE-ORDER
description:
Fashion-forward backpack perfect for school, travel or everyday use. 

100% Nylon Cordura construction. Matching nylon zipper closure. Front matching Nylon zipper pocket. Adjustable straps. Removable white leather zipper ties and an embroidered white logo.

This is a children's-sized backpack. Best for ages 2-8, big enough to fit folders and school related items.

Measurements: 13" x 10 5/8" ( 33cm x 27cm)

/// THESE ARE CUSTOM PRE-ORDERS. Each group of new orders is placed every Sunday night. Any order placed Monday-Saturday will await the upcoming Sunday's group order. /// Turn-around time is 2-3 weeks.

1. RED bag/ TEAL zipper + accents/SILVER straps. 
2. IMPERIAL BLUE bag/ HUNTER ORANGE zipper, accents + straps. 
3. NAVY bag/ FLUORESCENT YELLOW zipper + accents/BLACK straps. 4. CELTIC GREEN bag/ NAVY accents + straps. 
5. NEON CORAL bag/ EVERGREEN zipper /PURPLE straps. 
6. FLUORESCENT PINK bag/ WHITE zipper/ PURPLE straps.

options.name: 1. RED bag/ TEAL zipper   accents/SILVER straps.
2. IMPERIAL BLUE bag/ HUNTER ORANGE zipper, accents   straps.
3. NAVY bag/ FLUORESCENT YELLOW zipper   accents/BLACK straps.
5. NEON CORAL bag/ EVERGREEN zipper /PURPLE straps.
6. FLUORESCENT PINK bag/ WHITE zipper/ PURPLE straps.

name: Heather Grey Long Sleeved One-Piece with Logo in Black
description:
Our logo in black screen printed on a heather grey long sleeved American Apparel (made in USA) one-piece.

90% Baby Rib cotton construction (with 10% Polyester)

Shrinkage: will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

Care Info: To ensure the integrity of your handprinted item, take care to wash inside-out, in cold water (delicate cycle, if possible) and air dry. We use non-toxic, water-based inks so an eco-friendly phosphate-free detergent will be best. Fading does occur and the more you wash, the more worn-in and "vintage" your piece will become.

name: Women's Cranberry Tri-Blend Racerback Tank Top
description:
A fitted ultra soft tri-blend tank with our logo in white printed with eco-friendly ink. It has generously cut arm openings and a slim racerback.

Tri-Blend (50% Polyester / 25% Cotton / 25% Rayon) construction 
Polyester retains shape and elasticity; Cotton lends both comfort and durability; addition of Rayon makes for a unique texture and drapes against the body for a slimming look.

Tends to run small, so order up.

name: Infant Black Baby Thermal Long Sleeve T-Shirt with logo in Ash
description:
Our logo in the color ASH printed on an American Apparel baby thermal long sleeve t-shirt. Perfect for the little lady and/or little man in your life.  

Baby Thermal (55% Cotton / 45% Polyester)

Shrinkage: will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer 

6-12months is approximately 13 1/8" (33.3 cm) in total length 

Not intended for sleepwear 

Unisex

name: ADULT Grey Tri-Blend Pencil Waves Pullover
description:
Our new WE ARE WAVES OF ONE SEA pencil print in white on a grey American Apparel tri-blend raglan pullover.

A super comfy, lightweight, crewneck pullover for women in a soft Tri-Blend construction.

Printed with eco-friendly ink.

name: ADULT Black Aqua Poly Cotton Tank Top with Logo in White
description:
Our white logo printed with eco-friendly ink on an American Apparel, unisex tank.

This tank is made of 50/50 combed cotton/poly blend. Featuring a durable ribbed neckline, as well as durable ribbed arm openings. The combed cotton/poly blend provides an ultra soft, worn in feel and superior drape.

This tank is in men's sizes, so for women wanting a more fitted look, size down.

name: Organic Natural One-Piece with Logo in Ocean Blue
description:
Our logo in ocean blue printed on an organic natural colored American Apparel (made in USA) one-piece.  

This one-piece is a boutique-quality garment designed for maximum comfort and fit on infants of all sizes. 

Made of 100% fine ring-spun combed organic cotton, this finer 1x1 rib knit features a comfortable stretch with excellent durability through repeated washings. 

Shrinkage: will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

Care Info: To ensure the integrity of your handprinted item, take care to wash inside-out, in cold water (delicate cycle, if possible) and air dry. We use non-toxic, water-based inks so an eco-friendly phosphate-free detergent will be best. Fading does occur and the more you wash, the more worn-in and "vintage" your piece will become.

name: Black One-Piece with Logo in White
description:
Our logo in white screen printed on a black American Apparel (made in USA) one-piece.  

This one-piece is a boutique-quality garment designed for maximum comfort and fit on infants of all sizes. Fabricated in Interlock cotton for a sturdier feel and excellent recovery. 

Ideal for colder climates. 

Care Info: To ensure the integrity of your handprinted item, take care to wash inside-out, in cold water (delicate cycle, if possible) and air dry. We use non-toxic, water-based inks so an eco-friendly phosphate-free detergent will be best. Fading does occur and the more you wash, the more worn-in and "vintage" your piece will become.

name: Mauve (light pink) Capped-Sleeve Tee with Logo in Ocean Blue
description:
Our ocean blue logo screen printed with eco-friendly ink on a super soft and comfy 100% cotton jersey cap-sleeved tee. 

This laid-back top is finished with double-needle stitching and a rounded bottom hem on both the front and back.

name: Kid's Grey Tri-Blend Cardigan Sweater with Small Black Logo
description:
We printed our logo with black, eco-friendly ink on this ultra-soft and comfy grey Tri-Blend cardigan. 

With four buttons, this cardigan is the perfect addition to your little one's wardrobe this season

Unisex.

name: Black Pencil Waves Cap-Sleeve Tee
description:
Our new Pencil Waves design screen printed in white eco-friendly ink on a super soft and comfy 100% cotton jersey cap-sleeved tee. 

This laid-back top is finished with double-needle stitching and a rounded bottom hem on both the front and back.

name: Black Canvas Zippered Tote with Pencil Waves Design
description:
100% cotton canvas tote bag in black with our new Pencil Waves design in white. 

This eco-friendly tote is the perfect every-day bag with it's zippered outer pocket and gusset bottom, leaving plenty of room to carry around everything on-the-go.

We love that it has a zippered pocket for the main compartment, along with a small inner pocket for easy access for your phone and keys.

Measures: 17.5" x 15" x 4.5"

Every tote is screen printed with eco-friendly ink and may have variations in color, opaqueness and placement.

name: Kid's Grey Tri-Blend Pencil Waves Pullover
description:
Our new WE ARE WAVES OF ONE SEA pencil print in black on a grey American Apparel tri-blend raglan pullover.

A lightweight, crewneck pullover for kids in a soft Tri-Blend construction.

Printed with eco-friendly ink.

name: Adult White Pencil Waves Tee
description:
Our new WE ARE WAVES OF ONE SEA pencil print in black on a white American Apparel poly-cotton short sleeved tee. 

The perfect 50/50 blend creates a soft and comfortable slim-fitting T-shirt. 

This tee is an Unisex tee but the sizes go by men's sizes. So for women, please size down if you want it to fit truer to your size.

name: White Glossy Logo Decal
description:
Our new decal stickers are the perfect way to show your love for all mankind with a cool vibe. Place it on your car, van, rv, board, laptop, you name it! 

Made with a high quality self-adhesive vinyl to weather the weather. They are easy to apply and come with detailed instructions. 

They measure 5 inches in diameter. 

This is an add-on item, meaning if you purchase alone there is no additional shipping cost added.

name: Black Trucker Hat with Embroidered Logo in White
description:
Our logo in white embroidered on a 100% Cotton Trucker Hat. It's a mid-rise, five-panel twill cap featuring a foam crown, polyester mesh, and an adjustable snap-back closure.

One Size Fits most with the snap back closure. Awesome shade coverage from toddler to adult.

100% Cotton Chino Twill / 100% Polyester Mesh

name: Kid's Black Raglan Pullover Sweatshirt
description:
An easy going everyday pullover sweatshirt, just like the ones you remember as a kid. 

It's 100% USA made, American Apparel and 100% cotton fleece construction with our logo in white printed with Eco-friendly ink.

Unlike typical synthetic fleece, this California Fleece is made of 100% extra soft ring-spun combed cotton, pre-laundered for minimal shrinkage. Extra thick for extra warmth, yet breathable.

name: Adult Black Raglan Pullover Sweatshirt
description:
An easy going everyday pullover sweatshirt, just like the ones you remember as a kid. 

It's 100% USA made, American Apparel and 100% cotton fleece construction with our logo in white printed with Eco-friendly ink.

Unlike typical synthetic fleece, this California Fleece is made of 100% extra soft ring-spun combed cotton, pre-laundered for minimal shrinkage. Extra thick for extra warmth, yet breathable. 

This is an Unisex sweatshirt, so for women, order a size down. 
Male model is wearing a Medium. 
Female model is wearing an Extra-Small

name: Women's Striped Fine Jersey Racerback Tank Top
description:
A white with ash striped casual tank with our logo printed in ocean blue with Eco-friendly ink. This tank has generously cut arm openings with a sporty yet feminine racerback. 

Made of an American Apparel, 100% fine ring-spun cotton. 

Models are wearing size Small. Runs true to size.

name: Women's Black Tri-Blend Racerback Tank Top
description:
A fitted ultra soft tri-blend tank with our logo in white printed with eco-friendly ink. It has generously cut arm openings and a slim racerback. 

Tri-Blend (50% Polyester / 25% Cotton / 25% Rayon) construction
Polyester retains shape and elasticity; Cotton lends both comfort and durability; addition of Rayon makes for a unique texture and drapes against the body for a slimming look. 

Models are wearing a size small.
Tends to run small so order up.

name: Infant Silver T-Shirt with Logo in Black
description:
Our logo in the color black printed on an American Apparel Sheer T-shirt.  

Sheer Jersey (100% Combed Cotton). Super lightweight and comfy.

Every shirt is screen printed by hand in Hawaii and may have variations in color and placement.

Care Info: To ensure the integrity of your handprinted item, take care to wash inside-out, in cold water (delicate cycle, if possible) and air dry. We use non-toxic, water-based inks so an eco-friendly phosphate-free detergent will be best. Fading does occur and the more you wash, the more worn-in and "vintage" your piece will become.

*Photo Credit: Razi Wilson Photography

name: Two-Tone Teal and Black SnapBack Hat
description:
The ever-so popular SnapBack hat with a fresh two-tone teal and black. 

This is a full 6-panel, flat visor cap with a sweet green colored under-visor and 6 teal sewn eyelets. 

With the adjustable straps, it's a "One Size Fits Most" from kids to adults.

80% Acrylic / 20% Wool

name: Kid's Black Trucker Hat
description:
Our logo in white embroidered on a 100% Cotton, Trucker Hat. It's a mid-rise, five-panel twill cap featuring a cotton canvas crown, polyester mesh, and an adjustable snap-back closure.

One Size Fits most children with the snap back closure. Awesome shade coverage from baby to child (Baby-5yr). For children older than 5 years of age, try our regular Black Trucker Hat. 

100% Cotton Chino Twill / 100% Polyester Mesh

name: Kid's Grey Tri-Blend Tank Top with Logo in White
description:
Our logo in the color white printed on an American Apparel Tri-blend tank top. 

Tri-Blend: (50% Polyester / 25% Cotton / 25% Rayon) construction, making for a super soft, comfortable fit and feel. 

Tends to fit on the smaller side, so size up!

Every shirt is screen printed by hand in Hawaii and may have variations in color and placement. 

Care Info: To ensure the integrity of your handprinted item, take care to wash inside-out, in cold water (delicate cycle, if possible) and air dry. We use non-toxic, water-based inks so an eco-friendly phosphate-free detergent will be best. Fading does occur and the more you wash, the more worn-in and "vintage" your piece will become.
